title: Doctor Who - The Three Doctors DVD9 DVDR BBC Jon Pertwee
description:
The Three Doctors - Four Episodes

Synopsis: The Time Lords home planet is under attack by an unknown entity called  Omega. Their only hope is the third Doctor with assistance from his two previous incarnations.

Season ten of British sci-fi series "Doctor Who" began December 30, 1972 with the 10th anniversary special The Three Doctors. Previous Doctors William Hartnell and Patrick Troughton return to play the First and Second Doctor, though Hartnell's contribution amounts to merely a cameo because of his failing health at the time.

Bonus extras:
* audio commentary (also subtitled in English)
* subtitle bonus info track
* 40th anniversary DVD intro (3min)
* Three Doctors Picture Gallery (4min)
* Vintgage BBC Interviews from "Pebble Mill at One" 1972 (21min)
    - Bernard Wilkie who created many early Doctor Who monsters
    - Patrick Troughton
* Vintage "Blue Peter" BBC show 1973 (14min)
    - Interview with Jon Pertwee about his Doctor Who car
    - A look back at the first 10 years of Doctor Who
* Vintage 1990 BSB interviews (10m):
    - Actor Nicholas Courtney and Script Editor Terrrance Dicks
    - Writers David Martin and Bob Baker
    - Actor Jon Pertwee 
* Vintage Panopticon 1993 interviews with Jon Pertwee, Katy Manning and Nick Courtney(30m)
* "The Five Faces of Dr. Who" promo (4min)
